de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Class InvertedDistanceSimilarityFunction<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.InvertedDistanceSimilarityFunction<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>, SimilarityFunction<O>

    public class InvertedDistanceSimilarityFunction<O>
extends AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
    Adapter to use a primitive number-distance as similarity measure, by computing 1/distance.

      • DISTANCE_FUNCTION_ID

        public static final OptionID DISTANCE_FUNCTION_ID
        Parameter to specify the similarity function to derive the distance between database objects from. Must extend DistanceFunction .

        Key: -adapter.distancefunction

        Default value: EuclideanDistanceFunction
